verses.verse: "Speak <S%H1696><s%> to the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> <S%H802><s%> 'If a woman conceives, <S%H2232><s%> and bears <S%H3205><s%> a male child, <S%H2145><s%> then she shall be unclean <S%H2930><s%> seven <S%H7651><s%> days; <S%H3117><s%> as in the days <S%H3117><s%> of her monthly <S%H5079><s%> period <S%H1738><s%> she shall be unclean. <S%H2930><s%>
In the eighth <S%H8066><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> the flesh <S%H1320><s%> of his foreskin <S%H6190><s%> shall be circumcised. <S%H4135><s%>

She shall continue <S%H3427><s%> in the blood <S%H1818><s%> of purification <S%H2893><s%> thirty <S%H7970><s%>- three <S%H7969><s%> days. <S%H3117><s%> She shall not touch <S%H5060><s%> any holy <S%H6944><s%> thing, <S%H935><s%> nor come into the sanctuary, <S%H4720><s%> until the days <S%H3117><s%> of her purifying <S%H2892><s%> are completed. <S%H4390><s%>

But if she bears <S%H3205><s%> a female child, <S%H5347><s%> then she shall be unclean <S%H2930><s%> two weeks, <S%H7620><s%> as in her period; <S%H5079><s%> and she shall continue <S%H3427><s%> in the blood <S%H1818><s%> of purification <S%H2893><s%> sixty <S%H8346><s%> - six <S%H8337><s%> days. <S%H3117><s%>

<S%H3117><s%>"'When the days of her purification <S%H2892><s%> are completed, <S%H4390><s%> for a son, <S%H1121><s%> or for a daughter, <S%H1323><s%> she shall bring <S%H935><s%> to the priest <S%H3548><s%> at the door <S%H6607><s%> of the Tent <S%H168><s%> of Meeting, <S%H4150><s%> a <S%H1121><s%> year <S%H8141><s%> old lamb <S%H3532><s%> for a burnt offering, <S%H5930><s%> and a young <S%H1121><s%> pigeon, <S%H3123><s%> or a turtledove, <S%H8449><s%> for a sin offering: <S%H2403><s%>

and he shall offer <S%H7126><s%> it before <S%H6440><s%> Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> and make atonement <S%H3722><s%> for her; <S%H2891><s%> and she shall be cleansed from the fountain <S%H4726><s%> of her blood. <S%H1818><s%> <S%H8451><s%>"'This is the law for her who bears, <S%H3205><s%> whether a male <S%H2145><s%> or a female. <S%H5347><s%>

If she cannot afford a <S%H1767><s%> lamb, <S%H7716><s%> then she shall take two <S%H8147><s%> turtledoves, <S%H8449><s%> or two <S%H8147><s%> young <S%H1121><s%> pigeons; <S%H3123><s%> the one <S%H259><s%> for a burnt offering, <S%H5930><s%> and the other <S%H259><s%> for a sin offering: <S%H5930><s%> and the priest <S%H3548><s%> shall make atonement <S%H3722><s%> for her, <S%H2891><s%> and she shall be clean.'"
